agreement: By creating an account and using AWS DeepRacer, you agree to the <anchor1>AWS Customer Agreement (“Agreement”)</anchor1>, <anchor2>AWS Service Terms</anchor2>, <anchor3>AWS Privacy Notice</anchor3>, and <anchor4>AWS Acceptable Use Policy</anchor4>. Your AWS DeepRacer Student account is considered an AWS account for purposes of the Agreement. If you already have an Agreement with AWS, you agree that the terms of that agreement govern your use of this product.
forgotPasswordDesc: Enter your email and we'll send you a code to reset it.
incorrectCode: The verification code you entered is not correct.
passwordReq: Passwords must contain at least 8 characters uppercase, lowercase, number, and symbol.
resendCodeNotif: Successfully sent another code to the email address provided.
resetPasswordDesc: Check your inbox. If you haven't receive an email within a few minutes, check your spam folder.
signinLink: Already have a DeepRacer on AWS account?
signupDesc: Enter your email address and choose a password to create your account.
signupFailNotif: Sign up attempt failed. Please try again.
signupLink: Don't have a DeepRacer on AWS account?
validEmailAddress: Must be a valid email address
verifyEmailDesc: If you haven't received an email within a few minutes, check your spam folder. Verification codes expire after 15 minutes.
verifyEmailheader: Enter the six digit code you received via email
passwordUpdateError: Failed to update password. Please try again.
racerAliasConstraint: 3-20 characters, letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores only
aliasInvalidChars: Only letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores allowed
